short_bio: Anwar Hussain is a renowned chef known for his expertise in traditional Bengali cuisine. With over 15 years of experience, he has perfected the art of creating delectable dishes that are loved by all.
Ishmam Hussain is a veteran chef with over 20 years of experience in the culinary arts. He is well-known for his fusion dishes that combine traditional and modern cooking techniques.

Zakir Khan is a young and talented chef who has made a name for himself in the culinary world. With a passion for experimenting with new ingredients and flavors, he creates unique and innovative dishes that are sure to impress.
Zian Khan is a rising star in the world of cooking. Despite his relatively short career, he has already made a name for himself with his simple yet delicious recipes that are loved by all.
Tasnim Jara is a seasoned chef with over 18 years of experience in the kitchen. Her specialty is creating mouth-watering desserts that are both beautiful and delicious.
Mahbub Ahmed is a talented chef with a passion for healthy and nutritious food. His recipes are not only delicious but also focus on using fresh and wholesome ingredients.
